shortdesc.p: With over 100,000 files, the Knowledge Project needs a clear means of organizing its data. We use specific naming conventions for all files and folders, to order the large quantity of material.

topicmeta.shortdesc: With over 100,000 files, the Knowledge Project needs a clear means of organizing its data. We use specific naming conventions for all files and folders, to order the large quantity of material.
topicmeta.author: Peter M. Logan

shortdesc.p: This is our long-term storage for original image files of print editions of the Encyclopedia. We never modify these files. Instead, we copy them to the production/images folder for active use.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This is our long-term storage for original image files of print editions of the Encyclopedia. We never modify these files. Instead, we copy them to the production/images folder for active use.
topicmeta.author: Peter M. Logan

shortdesc.p: The second stage in the project is creating editions that we can analyze or place on the web. All files connected with either generating an edition or running an analysis of its data are contained here.

topicmeta.shortdesc: The second stage in the project is creating editions that we can analyze or place on the web. All files connected with either generating an edition or running an analysis of its data are contained here.
topicmeta.author: Peter M. Logan

shortdesc.p: We use this folder to organize useful information on TEI, OCR, metadata, the history of Encyclopedia Britannica, and more, including this manual.

topicmeta.shortdesc: We use this folder to organize useful information on TEI, OCR, metadata, the history of Encyclopedia Britannica, and more, including this manual.
topicmeta.author: Peter M. Logan

shortdesc.p: The first stage of the Nineteenth-Century Knowledge Project is creating the textual data from page images of the Encyclopedia Britannica. All files in this initial process are contained here.
